name: Caves of Chance
description:
How to Play

Proceed through levels, picking up dice and evading a massive drill. At the end of each level, you will be able to roll your dice on each of your statistics.

Arrow keys to move, Z to jump, X to dig.

Collecting a mimic dice or attempting to dig through stone will stun you for a second, allowing the drill to catch up with you.
